articles.title: Congratulations to PM of Chad
articles.content:
Congratulations to PM of Chad
Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Albert Pahim Padacke upon his reappointment as prime minister of the Republic of Chad.
					 The message wished him bigger successes in his work for the national unity and economic development of the country.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a congratulatory message to Moussa Faki Mahamat upon his reappointment as minister of Foreign Affairs, African Integration and International Cooperation of Chad.

articles.title: Namibia's First President on Invariable Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Namibia's First President on Invariable Friendly and Cooperative Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), met Namibia's First President Sam Nujoma on August 23. He visited Namibia at the head of a WPK delegation.
					 At the meeting the first president warmly welcomed the delegation, saying that he always remembers and feels thankful for the sincere help rendered by President Kim Il Sung to Namibia in its struggle for independence in the most difficult period.
					
					 Noting that the Namibian people could achieve the country's independence through an indomitable struggle amid active support of friendly states such as the DPRK, he extended deep thanks to the DPRK for extending unreserved support and assistance to Namibia even after its independence.
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to break the ties between the two friendly countries but Namibia would give steady continuity to the friendly and cooperative relations with the WPK and the government of the DPRK in the political, economic and all other fields, he stressed.
					
					 Peace and stability can be guaranteed only by military capability to protect oneself, he noted, calling on all progressive countries to get united to frustrate the moves of the imperialists.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that everything would go well in the DPRK which has the historic tradition of friendship.

articles.title: Vice-Chairman of WPK Central Committee Hold Talks with General Secretary of SWAPO
articles.content:
Vice-Chairman of WPK Central Committee Hold Talks with General Secretary of SWAPO
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who visited Namibia at the head of a WPK delegation, had talks with General Secretary of the South West Africa People's Organizational Party Nangolo Mbumba on August 22.
					 Ri Su Yong said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un was elected chairman of the WPK at its 7th Congress.
					
					 He informed the general secretary of how the 7th Congress of the WPK was held and the dynamic struggle being waged by all the party members, service personnel and other people for accomplishing the cause of building a socialist power.
					
					 He referred to the validity and vitality of the WPK's idea of prioritizing the people and the youth and underlined the need to invariably develop the friendly relations between the two parties.
					
					 The general secretary said that the eye-opening achievements made by the DPRK are the fruition of the unique politics and leadership mode of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK, adding that the WPK and the Koreran people under his wise leadership would always emerge victorious.
					
					 The Namibian people will always remember the disinterested support and encouragement rendered by the WPK and the Korean people to their struggle in the past, he noted, adding: We will as ever develop the relations with the DPRK, no matter how frequently the situation may change.
					
					 Noting that the achievements made by the WPK in the ideological work and the work with young people are precious experience for the SWAPO, he said it will proactively promote cooperation and exchange with the DPRK in various fields including the party building, ideological work and youth education.
					
					 The WPK delegation was invited to a banquet given by the SWAPO on the same day.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Italian PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Italian PM
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of sympathy to Matteo Renzi, prime minister of Italy, on August 25 as regards the earthquake that hit various cities of the central region of Italy, causing huge human and material losses.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the prime minister and the government of Italy, the victims and bereaved families on behalf of the government of the DPRK.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a message of sympathy to Paolo Gentiloni, minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Italy, on the same day.

articles.title: Spokesman for Foreign Ministry Raps Hostile Forces' Moves to Ratchet up Pressure on DPRK over Its SLBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Spokesman for Foreign Ministry Raps Hostile Forces' Moves to Ratchet up Pressure on DPRK over Its SLBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement on Friday:
					 The news of a SLBM test-fire successfully conducted at a higher level by scientists and technicians in the field of national defence of the DPRK came to rock the world. Against this backdrop, undesirable forces are moving to create an atmosphere of putting pressure on the DPRK over the test-fire.
					
					 The U.S. and some other countries following it are accusing the DPRK of its SLBM test-fire and an "urgent consultation" concerning it was held at UNSC on Thursday.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, terming the DPRK's test-fire of SLBM that fully demonstrated the nuclear attack capability of Juche Korea "violation of resolutions," brought it up to UNSC for discussion. This is just a hideous provocation reminiscent of the guilty party filing a suit first. 
					
					 The U.S. staged Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military drills only a few months ago, openly talking about "occupying Pyongyang," after bringing hugest-ever nuclear strategic assets and troops to south Korea.
					
					 It is now desperately kicking off joint military drills again to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK despite the unanimous denunciation and opposition of all Koreans and the world public.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation where a nuclear war may break out any moment is now prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the war rehearsal.
					
					 The U.S. outrageous nuclear intimidation only resulted in the steady increase of the DPRK's nuclear attack capability.
					
					 The SLBM test-fire which was successfully conducted without any adverse impact on the security of neighboring countries was a vivid manifestation and a striking demonstration of the tremendous power and inexhaustible strength of Juche Korea firmly consolidated in the face of the tempest of history and all challenges by the enemy.
					
					 The results of the test-fire proved in actuality that the DPRK joined the front rank of the military powers fully equipped with nuclear attack capability and the U.S. mainland and the operational theatre in the Pacific have come within the striking range of the DPRK, no matter how hard the U.S. tries to deny it.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK would deal merciless blows at the U.S. with nuclear hammers of justice so that nails of injustice may not come out again, once an opportunity is given, now that the DPRK has in place all substantial means capable of standing up against the U.S. nuclear hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. rash acts of taking issue with the DPRK's SLBM test-fire will only precipitate its self-destruction. The best way of escaping the deadly strike of the infuriated DPRK is to refrain from hurting its dignity and security with prudence and self-control.
					
					 If the U.S. attempts to threaten the dignity and vital rights of the DPRK even a bit despite its solemn warning, it will continue to take one after another epochal action steps it can show as a full-fledged military power.

articles.title: Spokesman for National Reconciliation Council Calls for Eliminating Park Geun Hye
articles.content:
Spokesman for National Reconciliation Council Calls for Eliminating Park Geun Hye
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council Friday made public a statement to denounce Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea for making desperate efforts like a rabid dog to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north after being taken aback by the news about the successful test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile.
					 As soon as she heard the news on August 24 Park appeared at a frontline unit of the puppet army, being stunned by it, and cried out for a "resolute counteraction", the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Intolerable is that traitor Park Geun Hye dared hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, a hideous provocation, in the wake of her nonsensical talk about "economic difficulties in the north" and "its vacillation."
					
					 This is treason that deserves punishment by Heaven as it is an intolerable insult to the service personnel and people of the DPRK.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army is waiting for the moment when the final order is issued to blow up Chongwadae, with the will to eliminate the mad woman of Chongwadae working hard to get the sun eclipsed by the palm.
					
					 It is the unanimous demand of all Koreans and the order of the nation's history to cut off the windpipe of Park Geun Hye at an early date as she wags her tongue nonstop, not content with her desperate efforts to create conflicts and antagonism within the nation wherever she goes and to inflict misfortune and disaster of a nuclear war on the nation.
					
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye should bear in mind that she can never escape the miserable fate under all Koreans' curse and denunciation though she goes frantic to get rid of destruction with impudent sophism and confrontation. 
					
					 All Koreans aspiring after national reconciliation and unity should beat hard and bury Park, traitor for all ages, and preserve peace and security on the Korean peninsula and bring earlier the country's reunification.

articles.title: Participants in Youth League Congress Visit Youth Movement Museum, National House of Class Education
articles.content:
Participants in Youth League Congress Visit Youth Movement Museum, National House of Class Education 
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited the Youth Movement Museum.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing among youth and children at the main lobby and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round photos of the peerlessly great persons and mementoes on display there.
					
					 They also visited the National House of Class Education.

articles.title: Participants in Youth League Congress Enjoy Art Performance
articles.content:
Participants in Youth League Congress Enjoy Art Performance
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League appreciated music and dance story "Life Story of Youth" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					 The art performance impressively depicted how young Koreans built the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 The performers represented with refined talent and good assemble the members of the Paektusan hero youth shock brigade who have grown strong in ideology and faith, possessed of the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu by devoting sweat and blood out of patriotism in the area of Paektu for more than a decade.
					
					 They made an artistic representation of how a magnificent structure was built by young people in Paektu area and how the legendry tale about Paektusan hero youth was created under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il who visited the construction site by making a long journey along a steep mountain road to repose profound trust in them and of Marshal Kim Jong Un who put their position on the highest level by advancing such new terms of the era that the young people are the masters of the youth power.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience.

articles.title: Participants in Youth League Congress Watches Documentary Film
articles.content:
Participants in Youth League Congress Watches Documentary Film
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League watched the Korean documentary film " Shining History of Youth Power" at the April 25 House of Culture Friday.
					 The film impressively deals with the history of the leadership President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un provided over the youth movement by founding the idea of prioritizing the youth for the first time in history and setting a world's example in solving the issue of youth, thereby glorifying the DPRK as a youth power unprecedented in the world. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials of the Party Central Committee together with the participants in the congress.

articles.title: Sports Contest among Public Health Workers Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest among Public Health Workers Opens
 Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- The 4th sports contest among public health workers was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday.
					 Its participants will compete in various events including basketball, volleyball and table-tennis in gymnasiums, stadiums and sporting parks in Pyongyang and provinces.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and players in the field of public health and teachers and students of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place a men's volleyball game between the Academy of Koryo Medicine and the Choe Kyong Thae Endocrine Institute. 
					
					 The contest will last till Sept. 2.

articles.title: Young People and Monumental Edifices
articles.content:
Young People and Monumental Edifices
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Young people in the DPRK have performed great feats in building a number of monumental edifices throughout the country.
					 They have played a vanguard role in socialist construction in each period of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Among projects they completed were the Haeju-Hasong railway, the Taesongsan Pleasure Ground, Chongnyon Street, extension of Wasandong-Ryongsong motorway, Kanggye Youth Power Station, the northern railway, the Youth Hero Motorway and Hungju Youth Power Station No. 2.
					
					 The heroic spirit of the young people to devotedly implement the tasks set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea has been carried forward generation after generation.
					
					 In recent years alone, they made big contributions to building Changjon Street, Unha Scientists Street, the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery and the Natural Energy Institute under the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 In April 2016, they successfully completed the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 before the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The proud feats performed by the DPRK youths would have been unthinkable without the loving care shown by the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for them.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il entrusted the construction of important projects of the country to young people, highly praised them for their labor feats and bestowed great favors upon them, seeing to it that many edifices are called by the name of "Youth".
					
					 While visiting the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station in April last year, supreme leader Kim Jong Un said:
					
					 "Patriotism being displayed by the members of the youth shock brigade in the construction site of the power station clearly proves that our country is a power of youth without an equal in the world".

articles.title: Achievements Made to Greet Youth Congress
articles.content:
Achievements Made to Greet Youth Congress
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made by young people of the DPRK, women workers in particular, to greet the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					 Two young women carried out the work equivalent to their five years' quota at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill which finished its yearly plan by August 23. 
					
					 Kim Jong Hyang, a participant in the congress, told KCNA that she wants to express her gratitude to supreme leader Kim Jong Un for glorifying the feats of young people on behalf of all the young employees of the mill who have carried out their daily quotas more than two times. 
					
					 Three weavers have done the work equivalent to their four year's assignments at the Sariwon Textile Mill. And several weavers carried out the work equivalent to their three or four years' quotas at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and Nyongbyon and Pakchon silk mills. 
					
					 Sim Un Hui, a women captain of a fishing vessel of the Tanchon Fishery Station, said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il highly praised virgin innovators of the former generation as Chollima standard-bearers and girls riding on galloping steeds. Now the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un puts forward us as Mallima standard-bearers. To repay the loving care shown the peerlessly great men, I will devote myself to building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il and Songun Politics
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il and Songun Politics
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- When the DPRK is seen as the spindle of independence, it can be said that the United States, styling itself as a Pacific country, is a blade attached to it. If the spindle rotates, its blades will naturally move along it, controlling the global wind. After all, one can say that the DPRK is in the position of holding the helm of a new trend of the world politics.
					 This is a phrase of a Western political commentator's article.
					
					 Inheriting the revolutionary cause of Songun (military-first) started by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il clarified the philosophical principle that Songun precisely represents independence, dignity and patriotism. And he had pursued the Songun politics to display the dignity and stamina of the country and the nation.
					
					 He inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960). Since then, his guidance for the strengthening of the revolutionary armed forces had continued without letup.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic and ceaseless military inspection and guidance, the KPA grew up to be a powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, equipped with modern means of attack and defence.
					
					 When the U.S.-led imperialists clamored about "collapse of north Korea" in the 1990s and the new century, he raised higher the sword of Songun.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, who propelled the revolution and construction with the People's Army as a driving force, the motive force for the Songun revolution was further strengthened, a great upsurge was witnessed in the economic construction and the Songun culture prevailed over the whole society.
					
					 Witnessing the reality of the DPRK, the world's progressives have zealously hailed the Songun politics as an ever-victorious banner for national sovereignty and independence against imperialism.
					
					 A renowned historian of Russia said that the new history of Songun politics made by Kim Jong Il is a distinguished feat of world historical significance.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the Songun politics, the DPRK's politics for independence, are now being displayed to the full under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Park Geun Hye Regime's Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Park Geun Hye Regime's Pro-Japanese Acts
Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime is making a fool of the south Korean people through its shameless pro-Japanese acts.
					Despite the protest of the south Korean people, the regime established "foundation for reconciliation and recovery" under the pretext of "supporting" the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army with a petty amount of money given by Japan. Not content with this, the regime decided to cover the expense for operating the foundation.
					
					The foundation is a product of the Park Geun Hye regime's diplomacy servile to Japan and despicable sycophancy towards it because the diplomacy is aimed at helping it evade its state and legal responsibility for the sexual slavery.
					
					The puppet regime is now claiming that the issue of sexual slavery was settled through "agreement" on Japan's paying such paltry amount of money.
					
					This is an intolerable insult to the victims of the sexual slavery and all other fellow countrymen and a heinous act of selling off the dignity and interests of the nation for a petty amount of money.
					
					The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is the hideous crime committed by Japan as the chastity of as many as 200,000 Korean women was violated by the Japanese imperialists. Therefore, it is a matter concerning the dignity of the Korean nation. It obliges Japan to pay a very high price for the crime for all ages.
					
					After making the humiliating "agreement" characterized by submission and disgrace last year, she had the effrontery to claim that the negotiations on the issue of the comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army culminated in getting the best gain ever attainable at the sincerest ones."
					
					Like a thief crying "Stop the thief!" Japan was impudent enough to say that "the issue of comfort women can be settled with three hundred million yen."
					
					And when Japan proposed offering fund only after removing a girl statue, the Park regime did not utter even a word of protest.
					
					Park also asked Japan for paying a billion yen before Aug. 15 in reward for drastically omitting issues arising in the relations with Japan including the issue of sexual slavery in her "August 15 address."
					
					The Park group of the modern-day "five traitors in 1905" is going so shameless as to opt for removing a girl statue in collusion with Japan, trumpeting about "recovery" and "reconciliation."
					
					This is the most hideous pro-Japanese act in the national history.
					
					The above-said facts clearly indicate that it is the invariable mode of existence for the traitors to prolong their remaining days by selling off the dignity and interests of the nation.
					
					The Koreans can never be in peace as long as the Park regime is allowed to go scot-free after unhesitatingly rubbing salt in the wounds of victims of the sexual slavery.
					
					All the fellow countrymen must eradicate the betes noires of history and the root cause of misfortune and pain as soon as possible.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Spirit of Paektusan Hero Youth
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Spirit of Paektusan Hero Youth
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The spirit of Paektusan hero youth is the revolutionary spirit symbolic of the great Kim Jong Un's era, the revolutionary spirit, a product of the Workers' Party of Korea's noble politics of prioritizing the youth, and the revolutionary spirit of our times which all people of the country should learn from, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The birth of the new spirit of the times is urgently required by the Korean revolution which has entered a higher stage of development, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The members of the Paektusan Hero Youth Shock Brigade took the lead in meeting the above-said requirements of the times and the revolution in the course of waging an indomitable struggle despite rigorous difficulties and trials after rushing to the construction site of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station in hearty response to the call of the Party.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un named this unshakable mental spirit displayed by the Paektusan youth the "spirit of Paektusan hero youth" and made sure that it is called the revolutionary spirit representing the present times.
					
					 The main reason why the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is projecting the spirit as the spirit of the present times is that it serves as the most revolutionary and militant idea and spirit representing the present times and, at the same time, the fighting spirit created by young people, a vanguard unit and a main unit of the revolution.
					
					 Thanks to the great Songun leadership and Songun politics of the WPK, the DPRK has built tremendous national power with the strongest military muscle in the world as the core and laid a solid foundation for building an economic giant capable of making a leap forward to surpass the world's level.
					
					 Now that the political and military strength has been fully provided to defend the country and build a powerful socialist nation, the issue of the destiny of our revolution at present mainly depends on how the young people, the successors to the revolution, are prepared and how they play their role.
					
					 Only when the young people, the reserves of the Party, the main force of the army and pillars taking the destiny of the country and the nation on their shoulders, are strong, can the Party, the army and the country be strong.
					
					 The more rapidly the young people playing a vanguard and core role which no other force can perform in their place advance, the faster the country can change in its appearance and the earlier its rosy future will come. This is the reality.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Songun Revolutionary Feats
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Il's and Kim Jong Un's Songun Revolutionary Feats
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Songun serves as the terms of the era symbolizing and praising the personality of leader Kim Jong Il as the peerlessly great man and his immortal revolutionary career and feats, and as the terms symbolic of the era of independence, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 There are the invincible might of the Korean People's Army and the might of the DPRK dignified for being the world's political and military power and full-fledged nuclear weapons state thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership he had provided all his life, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Songun politics pursued by him instilled into many countries aspiring after independence the conviction and courage that imperialism is by no means strong and a country, however small it is, is sure to win if it prioritizes military affairs and bravely fights against imperialism.
					
					 After making his appearance in the era with the spirit of reigning over the world and the sun, the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, another great brilliant commander of Songun, has steered the political trend of the world and the new century of history and enabled the DPRK to emerge a matchless nuclear weapons state and prosperous country of the people.
					
					 As Kim Jong Un is steering the world's political trend to the orientation of independence with a wealth of experience, the Songun revolutionary feats performed by Kim Jong Il are immortal and the future of mankind is bright.
					
					 The 21st century will shed its rays as the century of Korea as the world will move centering around it.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Impudent Rigmaroles
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Impudent Rigmaroles
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea held the "Ulji national security council meeting" and "Ulji state council meeting" at Chongwadae on August 22, timed to coincide with the start of Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill. There she cried out for "keeping themselves fully combat-ready" and "strongly retaliating against any provocation" while talking about "provocation from the north" and "its bolstering of nuclear capability at a high level." She imprudently uttered this or that about the social system in the north, laying bare once again her foolish dream of achieving "unification of social systems."
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What she uttered is a brazen-faced talk made by her, feeling guilty of the dangerous north-targeted saber-rattling being staged by the provocateurs in collusion with outsiders.
					
					 Great irony is that Park is working hard to mislead the public opinion by spouting a flurry of malignant invectives hurting the social system in the DPRK, unaware of how things are going in the world.
					
					 The sheer jargons reeled off by her in a bid to dare hurt the dignified socialist system in the DPRK where all service personnel and people are single-mindedly united are nothing but rubbish uttered by an idiot without an equal, utterly ignorant and lacking any elementary ability to judge the situation.
					
					 The hearts of all service personnel and people of the DPRK are burning with hatred against Park Geun Hye, cruel and wicked confrontation maniac, and the resolution to take revenge upon her, and their arms are leveled at the old witch of Chongwadae as they do not show any mercy to the aggressors, provocateurs.
					
					 Park will have to keenly realize what disastrous consequences will be entailed by her reckless tongue-lashing.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Blasts Security Authorities' Suppression
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Blasts Security Authorities' Suppression
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations of south Korea on Aug. 24 held a press conference before the building of the Seoul Southern District Prosecutor's Office in demand of a halt to the suppression of the representative of the "Worker's Book", a social organization, who is under investigation on the charge of violating the "Security Law", according to a south Korean paper.     .
					 On July 28, the puppet security authorities searched his house on charges that he collected and kept rare social scientific books and distributed them to those who wished to read them.
					
					 Speakers at the press conference held that most of those books confiscated by the security authorities are just the same as those displayed at the public library.
					
					 They demanded the security authorities halt the fascist suppression and repeal the "Security Law".

articles.title: Action for Checking THAAD Deployment Staged by Kimchon Citizens
articles.content:
Action for Checking THAAD Deployment Staged by Kimchon Citizens
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A rally took place in Kimchon, North Kyongsang Province under the sponsorship of the Kimchon Committee for Struggle against THAAD, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Attending it were more than 10 000 citizens.
					
					 Speakers said THAAD should not be deployed in any place of south Korea.
					
					 A resolution vowing to check THAAD deployment was read out at the rally.
					
					 Then, the mayor of Kimchon and co-chairpersons of the Kimchon Committee for Struggle against THAAD had their heads shaven in protest against THAAD deployment.

articles.title: Korean Youths in Japan Protest against Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Korean Youths in Japan Protest against Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A protest group of Korean youths in Japan staged actions against the U.S. Embassy and south Korean puppet Embassy in Tokyo on August 24 as regards the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					 Armored cars of riot police of Japan and dozens of its policemen cordoned off the U.S. Embassy to block the protest group.
					
					 Members of the group bitterly denounced the U.S. imperialist aggressors staging the cruelest and outrageous war exercises for aggression in the world.
					
					 The protest group staged an action against the south Korean puppet Embassy.
					
					 All members of the group charged to the main gate of the embassy and condemned traitor Park Geun Hye keen on escalating confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 The head of the protest group read out a written protest reflecting the will of Korean youths in Japan to inflict a stern judgment to Park Geun Hye and thrust it to the puppet embassy.

articles.title: Koreans in China Praise Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits
articles.content:
Koreans in China Praise Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Exploits
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Aug. 24 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said:
					
					 General Kim Jong Il provided a firm guarantee for the independent reunification of the country and everlasting prosperity of the Korean nation with his Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics. The undying exploits he performed out of his patriotism are eternal treasures which are recorded in gold letters in the nation's history spanning 5000 years.
					
					 His Songun leadership brought about miraculous achievements in the homeland.
					
					 The DPRK has stood firm against the U.S. and made dynamic progress towards prosperity despite all unfair sanctions. This reality would be unthinkable without his Songun leadership.
					
					 Even at this moment the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers seeking to deploy THAAD in south Korea kicked off a joint military exercise Ulji Freedom Guardian, pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The Koreans in China will frustrate every war move of the U.S. imperialists and their followers, and step up the patriotic work to bring earlier the building of a powerful socialist country and national reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the great brilliant commander of Songun.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Portrait of Smiling Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Strategic Submarine Underwater Ballistic Missile Test-fire
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A test-fire of strategic submarine-launched ballistic missile was successfully conducted under the guidance of supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA) Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 At the observation post he was briefed on the plan for the test-fire.
					
					 As soon as he issued an order to start the test-fire, the strategic submarine submerged up to a depth for firing the ballistic missile and rapidly launched the ballistic missile.
					
					 The test-fire which was conducted under a high-angle fire system in the maximum launching depth reconfirmed the stability of the underwater ballistic launching system, the starting character of the high power solid fuel engine and phased flying kinetic feature after coming up to the surface of the water. It proved that the core technical indexes of the ballistic missile including the reliability of the phased heat separation and the control and guidance system and the working accuracy of the warhead in the re-entry section perfectly met all requirements for operation.
					
					 The SLBM test-fire was successfully carried out without any adverse impact on neighboring countries.
					
					 Watching the trajectory of the ballistic missile Pukguksong, he said with pleasure that it was a great manifestation and demonstration of the tremendous power and inexhaustible muscle of the DPRK and he felt enormous energy was welling out.
					
					 He appreciated the test-fire as the greatest success and victory and highly praised the officials, scientists and technicians in the field of national defence science and munitions factories for having perfectly acquired the technology of SLBM in a short span of time and extended special thanks to them in the name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 He noted with pride that the results of the test-fire proved in actuality that the DPRK joined the front rank of the military powers fully equipped with nuclear attack capability.
					
					 The U.S. vicious nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK only resulted in bolstering up its nuclear attack capability hour by hour and the U.S. mainland and the operational theatre in the Pacific are now within the striking range of the KPA, no matter how hard the U.S. tries to deny it, he said.
					
					 Strongly warning the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group staging the joint military exercise aiming at a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK with huge nuclear strategic assets involved and thereby seriously rattling its nerves, he said the Korean people would deal merciless blows at them with nuclear hammers of justice so that nails of injustice may not come out again, once an opportunity is given, now that the DPRK has in place all substantial means capable of standing up against the U.S. nuclear hegemony.
					
					 He noted: "I do not guess what ridiculous remarks the U.S. and its followers will make about this test-fire, but I can say their rash acts will only precipitate their self-destruction.  The best way of escaping the deadly strike of the infuriated KPA is to refrain from hurting the dignity and security of the DPRK with prudence and self-control."
					
					 Warning the enemies not to underestimate the might of the DPRK, he said it would clearly show the world how it would proudly tower, after breaking the chains of sanctions, blockade and pressure of the enemies.
					
					 He stressed the need for the field of national defence science to put increased spurs to mounting nuclear warheads on ballistic missiles in order to cope with the unpredicted total war and nuclear war with the U.S. imperialists and, at the same time, focus all efforts on the development of means of their delivery.
					
					 He instructed officials to take a series of all eventful actions to demonstrate the DPRK's muscle as a full-fledged military power if the enemies try to threaten its dignity and the right to existence even a bit.
					
					 He warmly greeted the national defence scientists and service personnel of the navy returning to the port after the successful test-fire and warmly congratulated them.
					
					 He had a photo session with them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Introduced by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- "4. For Global Independence" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was posted by the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on its website on August 17.
					 "4. For Global Independence" deals with the international circumstances of the Korean revolution and the achievements made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in international relations during the period under review.
					
					 It also indicates the characteristics of the present international situation, the principled issue arising in realizing global independence, the foreign policy of the WPK and the tasks and ways of carrying it out.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Il's Feats Held in Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the feats of leader Kim Jong Il was held by the 10 branches under the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 16 and 17 on the 56th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The chief of a branch in a report said that HE Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership by providing field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960. Under his leadership the Korean People's Army has grown to be the army strongest in ideology and faith and the matchless army ready for attack and defense and possessed of nuclear deterrence, the chief added.
					
					 The chief of another branch said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the idea of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and military affairs as required by the new situation and thus comprehensively systematized it as the Songun idea and Songun political theory and established the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism.
					
					 The chief of a branch said that the DPRK could win one victory after another in the political and military confrontation with the imperialist allied forces for the past decades thanks to the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il. The chief praised him for firmly defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country by pursuing the invincible Songun politics.

articles.title: Iranian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il as Peerlessly Brilliant Commander of Songun
articles.content:
Iranian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il as Peerlessly Brilliant Commander of Songun
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Iranian newspaper Iran News on August 21 carried a special write-up illustrated with a photo of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 In an article titled "Kim Jong Il, peerlessly brilliant commander of Songun" the newspaper said that under his Songun revolutionary leadership the DPRK has always won one victory after another in the ceaseless political and military confrontation with the U.S. styling itself the "super power".
					
					 Noting Kim Jong Il smashed all the moves of the U.S. imperialists to ignite a new war and firmly defended the dignity and sovereignty of socialist Korea with his matchless grit and pluck, the newspaper gave detailed accounts of the U.S. armed spy ship Pueblo incident, large spy plane EC-121 incident, the adoption of the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework, the DPRK's declaration of its access to nuclear weapons and its successful launch of satellites. It went on:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK could win victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and make achievements in the building of a socialist power thanks to the invincible Songun politics of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He is, indeed, the peerlessly brilliant commander who led the confrontation with the U.S. to victory all the time by dint of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian News
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Russian News
 Pyongyang, August 26 (KCNA) -- The Russian internet news Primorski Reporzor posted a special write-up praising President Kim Il Sung's exploits in liberating Korea on August 21 on the 71st anniversary of Korea's liberation illustrated with his photo.
					 It said:
					
					 The Korean people are celebrating August 15 with splendor to convey the exploits of President Kim Il Sung who rescued the destiny of the country and nation from the military occupation by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 He embarked on the road of struggle for regaining the country usurped by outside forces and founded the great Juche idea in the course.
					
					 He founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and led the arduous anti-Japanese war to victory to accomplish the historic cause of Korea's liberation.
					
					 As the country was liberated the Korean people could be proud masters of their destiny, state and society, free from the destiny of the colonial slaves of the Japanese imperialists and lead an independent and dignified life.
					
					 His exploits in liberating Korea will shine forever along with the invincible history of socialist Korea led by the respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: MINREX refuta calumnias de EE.UU. y sus satelites contra el lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM de RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX refuta calumnias de EE.UU. y sus satelites contra el lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM de RPDC 
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 la siguiente declaracion:
					Estos momentos conmueve a todo el mundo la noticia sobre el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM, realizado en etapa mas elevada por los cientificos y tecnicos de defensa nacional de la RPDC, mientras que las fuerzas malsanas muestran los movimientos para crear el ambiente de presion anti-RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. y algunos paises aliados cuestionan el lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM de la RPDC, y se efectuo el pasado dia 25 la "consulta emergente" en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					EE.UU. y sus satelites sometieron a la consideracion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU el lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM de la RPDC, que demostro a todo el mundo la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la Corea del Juche, calificandolo de "violacion de resolucion", lo cual es una perversa provocacion igual que un incendiario que grita primero "!Fuego!". 
					
					Hace unos meses, EE.UU. introdujo en el suelo surcoreano los efectivos y propiedades estrategicas nucleares de mayor envergadura y libro los ejercicios belicos conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle 16 hablando abiertamente de la "ocupacion de Pyongyang". Y ahora se entrega de nuevo al fanatico simulacro conjunto para asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC, pese al unanime rechazo y repudio del interior y exterior.
					
					Debido a tal imprudencia, la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra en la crisis que puede extenderse a la guerra nuclear en cualquier momento. 
					
					Pero, la perversa amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. no trajeron otro resultado mas que el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de ataque nuclear de la RPDC. 
					
					El presente lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM, realizado exitosamente sin dar ninguna influencia negativa a la seguridad de los paises vecinos, constituye la manifestacion del inagotable poderio estatal de la Corea del Juche, consolidado por todos los medios superando las pruebas de la historia y los desafios de toda indole de los enemigos. 
					
					El resultado de la presente prueba comprobo que la RPDC ha entrado en la primera fila de potencias militares dotadas perfectamente de la capacidad de ataque nuclear y que el propio territorio estadounidense y la zona operacional del Pacifico estan en mano de la RPDC, aunque lo niega EE.UU. 
					
					Dado que disponemos de todos los medios sustanciales para hacer frente a la hegemonia nuclear de EE.UU., el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos, si les toca la oportunidad, golpearan sin piedad con el martillo nuclear de justicia al artefacto nuclear de injusticia.
					
					La insolencia de EE.UU. que cuestiona el lanzamiento de prueba de SLBM de la RPDC acelerara la autodestruccion de si mismo. Y el mejor remedio para evitar nuestro ataque demoledor es controlarse sin ofender a nuestra dignidad y seguridad.
					
					Si EE.UU. se atreve a amenazar aun en lo minimo la dignidad y el derecho a la existencia de la RPDC despreciando nuestra seria advertencia, mostraremos consecutiva y escalonadamente todas las medidas practicas trascendentes que podemos mostrar como una digna potencia militar.

articles.title: CRN refuta calumnia anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CRN refuta calumnia anti-RPDC de Park Geun-hye 
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 26 una declaracion, condenando a la banda de Park Geun-hye quien pasmada de la noticia sobre el exitoso lanzamiento de prueba de misil balistico de submarino estrategico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, calumnia brutalmente a la parte connacional.
					Tan pronto como escuchara el dia 24 la noticia sobre el lanzamiento de prueba, Park Geun-hye fue a una unidad militar en el frente avanzado donde hablo de la "represalia rotunda", revela la nota y continua:
					
					Lo mas intolerable es que insatisfecha con las sofisterias como "crisis economica" y "vacilacion" de alguien, la traidora Park calumnio atrevidamente hasta la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, lo cual es un insulto intolerable al ejercito y pueblo coreanos y crimen que merece el castigo divino.
					
					Ahora, el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu espera la orden final con la decision de eliminar primero Chongwadae y su duena Park que se desespera por tapar los rayos del sol. 
					
					La unanime demanda y orden de la nacion es quitarle cuanto antes la vida a Park Geun-hye que fomenta solo la discordia y el antagonismo entre los connacionales, hace esfuerzos desesperados por acarrear las desgracias y calamidades de guerra nuclear a la nacion y pronuncia los disparates contra la parte connacional.
					
					 La traidora Park debe tener presente que si se desespera por librarse de la ruina con la astuta sofisteria y la locura conflictiva, no podra evitar el destino tragico y sera condenado por toda la nacion. 
					
					  Todos los coreanos, que desean la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, aniquilaran rotundamente a la traidora Park Geun-hye, defenderan la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y anticiparan sin falta la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Participantes en IX Congreso de UJS ven funcion musical y coreografica
articles.content:
Participantes en IX Congreso de UJS ven funcion musical y coreografica
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los participantes en el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung presenciaron en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion musical y coreografica "Autobiografia de la juventud".
					  Mediante el solo, el coro, la danza y otras piezas la funcion describio con gran emocion el proceso de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Heroes Jovenes Paektusan por los jovenes coreanos.
					
					  Los ejecutantes demostraron bien con la habilidad y el acoplamiento el aspecto de los miembros de la brigada juvenil  que se formaron como los fuertes en la ideologia y la conviccion con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, el espiritu del viento cortante del Paektu, poniendo en pleno manifiesto el patriotismo durante mas de 10 anos en la zona del monte Paektu.
					
					  Dieron a conocer el hecho de que se levanto ese monumento de la juventud en la zona del monte Paektu y se creo el mito de los jovenes heroes del monte Paektu bajo la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien dio la gran confianza a los jovenes visitando hasta el campo de construccion de la central, y del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien hizo brillar en el supremo plano la posicion de la juventud presentando nuevo vocablo del tiempo, protagonista de potencia juvenil.
					
					  La funcion arranco efusivas ovaciones de los espectadores.

articles.title: Participantes en IX Congreso de UJS ven documental
articles.content:
Participantes en IX Congreso de UJS ven documental
Pyongyang, 26 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los participantes en el IX Congreso de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung vieron el dia 26 el documental coreano "Brillante historia de la potencia de la juventud" en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril. 
					   El documental demuestra con emocion la historia de la direccion sobre el movimiento juvenil del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, quienes presentaron por primera vez en la historia la idea de dar importancia a la juventud y crearon el ejemplo mundial de resolucion del problema juvenil, asi como convirtieron la RPDC en la unica potencia juvenil en el mundo. 
					
					   Lo vieron junto con los delegados juveniles Choe Ryong Hae, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del PTC.
